00019 /*
00020  *
00021  *
00022  */
00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *fic;
00028     unsigned char buf[1];
00029     struct List *list, *cell;
00030     BOOL true = TRUE;
00031  
00032     adfEnvInitDefault();
00033 
00034     /* create and mount one device */
00035     hd = adfCreateDumpDevice("newdev", 80, 2, 11);
00036     if (!hd) {
00037         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00038         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00039     }
00040 
00041     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00042 
00043     if (adfCreateFlop( hd, "empty", FSMASK_FFS|FSMASK_DIRCACHE )!=RC_OK) {
00044         fprintf(stderr, "can't create floppy\n");
00045         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00046         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00047     }
00048 
00049     vol = adfMount(hd, 0, FALSE);
00050     if (!vol) {
00051         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00052         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00053         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00054     }
00055 
00056     fic = adfOpenFile(vol, "file_1a","w");
00057     if (!fic) { adfUnMount(vol); adfUnMountDev(hd); adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1); }
00058     adfWriteFile(fic,1,buf);
00059     adfCloseFile(fic);
00060 
00061     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00062 
00063     adfCreateDir(vol,vol->curDirPtr,"dir_5u");
00064 
00065     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol, vol->curDirPtr);
00066     while(cell) {
00067         printEntry(cell->content);
00068         cell = cell->next;
00069     }
00070     adfFreeDirList(list);
00071 
00072     adfSetEntryComment(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_5u", "dir_5u comment");
00073     adfSetEntryComment(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "file_1a", "file_1a very very long comment");
00074 
00075     putchar('\n');
00076 
00077     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00078     while(cell) {
00079         printEntry(cell->content);
00080         cell = cell->next;
00081     }
00082     adfFreeDirList(list);
00083 
00084     adfSetEntryComment(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "dir_5u", "");
00085     adfSetEntryComment(vol, vol->curDirPtr, "file_1a", "new comment" );
00086 
00087     putchar('\n');
00088 
00089     adfChgEnvProp(PR_USEDIRC, &true);
00090 
00091     cell = list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00092     while(cell) {
00093         printEntry(cell->content);
00094         cell = cell->next;
00095     }
00096     adfFreeDirList(list);
00097 
00098     adfUnMount(vol);
00099     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00100 
00101     adfEnvCleanUp();
00102 
00103     return 0;
00104 }
